title: Track a Reporter's Progress on a Story
description: An editor needs to check in on a reporter's progress for a long-term story to ensure it is on track to meet its deadline.

tasks.description: Open the story's entry in the newsroom management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accesses the story's project file.

tasks.description: Review the reporter's logged activities, notes, and the current status of the story.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets an overview of the work done so far.

tasks.description: Send a message to the reporter asking for a brief status update and if they are facing any roadblocks.
tasks.expected_outcome: The editor proactively checks in with the reporter.
